Text: Seeded by 1Gb/s bandwidth server. Have fun.
The story of Mojang. A millionaire that had enough money to sit around and program some silly games, and only one took of. Great story, it puts me right to sleep.
@Ryuuken24: Dude, he wasn´t a millionaire when he made the game. And although YOU may find Minecraft a silly game, I´m sure 9 the million paying for the game don´t share your opinion.

Subtitles are awfully synched :/
Video/sound quality is good, though.
Seeded by another gigabit server in Europe... Enjoy :)
Even though the subtitles are coded into the video, they are not permanent. In KMPlayer, I changed the  resync to 2.500 seconds, and now it perfectly lines up with the audio.
